ingredients.ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) cans artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
2 (4 ounce) cans green chile peppers, drained and chopped
1 (4 ounce) jar pimento peppers, drained and chopped
½ (8 ounce) package shredded Monterey Jack cheese
½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided

cookingTips: Drain all vegetables thoroughly to prevent a watery dip
The combination of green chiles and pimentos creates balanced heat and sweetness
Save half the Parmesan for topping to create a golden crust
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how layering different peppers creates complexity and how Monterey Jack cheese complements Southwestern flavors.
